title: How to write a letter to your friend, congratulating him or her on his or her success - Quora

response.answer_text: To, 22\Vasant Vihar Somnath Solony Jaipur 13th September D ear Ramesh i was very happy receive your letter yesterday. We are very happy to know that you are secured 98%marks in your 12th standard examination We are proud of your great success.We all send your our heartiest congratulation.You have really worked hard. You deserved this succees . Please pay my regards to your parents. Your sincerly Rahul

Hey (Friend’s name), Hope this letter finds you in the pink of health. I got to know about your (whatever it is you want to congratulate them for) and I am so proud of you. I always believed that you would achieve laurels. Congratulations to you, my dear friend. I hope you’ll keep succeeding and give us more reasons to celebrate. Happy for you. Regards,(your name)
